definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: "Summer hours" are a long-established institution in the US.
sentences.chinese: “夏令时”制度在美国已实施很长时间。

sentences.english: I was about twelve years old, and attending a summer camp in the Green Mountains called Camp Challenge.
sentences.chinese: 那时我十二岁，参加了绿山的一个夏令营，即挑战营。

sentences.english: Nowadays, summer camp is even more specialized.
sentences.chinese: 现而今，暑期夏令营则变得更为专向化。

sentences.english: This camp as a real life-changing experience that I ill never forget.
sentences.chinese: 这次夏令营真实的生活体验令我永远难忘。

sentences.english: Two years ago, the U.S. saved energy by starting daylight saving three weeks earlier.
sentences.chinese: 两年前，美国通过把夏令时提前三周来节约能源。

sentences.english: This camp was a real life-changing experience that I will never forget.
sentences.chinese: 这次夏令营真实生活体验令永远难忘。

sentences.english: This summer, I was supposed to go to my favorite camp.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天，我本来是要参加自己最喜爱的夏令营的。

sentences.english: The students returned to their respective schools after the summer camps.
sentences.chinese: 夏令结束之后学生们就回到自己各自的学校。

sentences.english: I am sure this picture of Mr. Reid kneeling in prayer was taken at one of Calvary's camps or retreats.
sentences.chinese: 李牧师跪下祈祷的照片是在夏令会或退修会拍下。

sentences.english: He developed the first rules for a summer boys' baseball program.
sentences.chinese: 他是第一个完善了少年棒球夏令营活动条例的人。

sentences.english: They just came this week from the ABCD Camp.
sentences.chinese: 他们这周刚从ABCD夏令营回来。

sentences.english: We haudio-videoe flexible work hours during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 我们在夏令的事业时间有弹性。

sentences.english: This summer, I attended summer camp, the most memorable had to be Deng Changcheng.
sentences.chinese: 今年暑假，我参加了夏令营，最难忘的要属登长城了。

sentences.english: Agar is very light and delicious for summer.
sentences.chinese: 大菜丝清凉可口，是夏令佳品。

sentences.english: A total of 72 English teachers in Fuyuan participated in the summer camp.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏令营的活动对象为老师，参加老师达72人。

sentences.english: This year, a variety of summer camps are proving popular with students and parents.
sentences.chinese: 今年，各种各样的夏令营确实受到学生和家长的欢迎。

definition: to spend a summer holiday/(esp of Chinese medicine) to relieve summer heat
Xiaoshu or Lesser Heat, 11th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd July
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
to spend the summer/to take a summer vacation
the hottest period of the year/see 三伏天[san1 fu2 tian1]
three periods forming the hottest periods of summer, from mid-July to mid-August, namely: 初伏 (mid-July), 中伏 (late July to early August), 末伏 (mid-August)
Qiufen or Autumn Equinox, 16th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd September-7th October
Xiazhi or Summer Solstice, 10th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st June-6th July
Chushu or End of Heat, 14th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd August-7th September
